NK071(du)008:0: thog mar yum gyi skye mched la gtso bo yab
NK071(du)008:1: yum gnyis spyir bstims pa'i lha thabs kyi lha bzhi
NK071(du)008:2: bcu ste yab kyi spyi bo rnam snang /
NK071(du)008:4: thugs kar rdo rje sems dpa' /
NK071(du)008:6: gsang gnas su don grub mig gi nang rtsar sa snying /
NK071(du)008:7: phyi rtsar byams pa rna ba'i nang rtsar spyan ras
NK071(du)008:8: phyi rtsar sgrib sel sna'i nang rtsar nam snying phyi
NK071(du)008:9: rtsar kun bzang / lce nang rtsar phyag rdor /
NK071(du)008:10: phyi rtsar 'jam dpal la sogs phyag g.yas gshin rje /
NK071(du)008:11: g.yon stobs chen zhabs g.yas rta mgrin g.yon bdud rtsi'o //
NK071(du)008:17: rkang mthil dmyal ba'i thub pa /
NK071(du)008:19: de bzhin du yum la yum rnams dgod par sbyar te thabs kyi lha bzhi bcu /
NK071(du)008:20: de re re'i thugs kar shes rab kyi lha ye shes sems dpa' re re ste bzhi bcu /
NK071(du)008:21: thabs kyi gnas gsum du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
NK071(du)008:22: lha sku gsung thug sa kyi lha gsum ste bzhi
NK071(du)008:23: bcu phrag gsum / sngar gyi dang log pas nyis
NK071(du)008:24: brgya bdag po rigs kyi lha dbu rgyan lnga lnga
NK071(du)008:25: bkon pas dbu rgyan gyi lha stong phrag khrigs bcad
NK071(du)008:26: bcu phrag gsum / do // sangs rgyas stong gi dkyil 'khor yang //
NK071(du)008:27: ri rab til 'bru'i tshul bzhin du //
NK071(du)008:29: de bzhin rnam snang la sogs par yab yum zung bcu bdun thub pa drug ste /
NK071(du)008:30: nyer gsum la stong stong brtsis pas sngar gyi dang
NK071(du)008:31: log pas stong phrag nyi shu rtsags te lam rim
NK071(du)008:32: dang mthun par brtsis nas de'i steng dbu rgyan gyi
NK071(du)008:33: gzhi thabs dang shes rab bsam gyis mi khyab pa
NK071(du)008:34: sku gsung thugs kyi lha nyis brgya phrag nyi shu
NK071(du)008:35: bzhi ste gtso bo yab yum la sngar bzhin thabs
NK071(du)008:37: de re re'i thugs kar shes rab kyi ye shes
NK071(du)008:38: sems dpa' re re bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sku
NK071(du)008:39: gsung thugs kyi lha gsum gsum gnas su bkod pas
NK071(du)008:41: de re re la bdag po rigs kyi lha dbu
NK071(du)008:42: rgyan lnga lnga bkon pas dbu rgyan gyi lha stong
NK071(du)008:43: nyis brgya lnga bcu byung tshogs su stong bdun brgya
NK071(du)008:44: bzhi bcu'o // dang por gtso bo badz+ra he ru ka'i spyi bor bud+d+ha /
NK071(du)008:49: tshogs brgyad kyi dbang brten nang rtsar ko'u ri las so brgyad /
NK071(du)008:50: phyi rtsar seng+ha las sa brgyad /
NK071(du)008:51: yan lag bzhir sgo ba bzhi /
NK071(du)008:52: sgal tshigs nyer brgyad la dbang mo /
NK071(du)008:53: de bzhin badz+ra kro ta'i gnas lngar yang yab la
NK071(du)008:54: bkod pa bzhin du khrag 'thung yum lnga bkod de
NK071(du)008:55: / yan lag bkod pas lnga bcu brgyad //
NK071(du)008:56: cha lnga'i grangs ni gnyis brgya dang //
NK071(du)008:57: dgu bcu lha la yang dag ldan //
NK071(du)008:58: ces pas nga brgyad phrag lnga la de ltar lha
NK071(du)008:59: nga gsum kun la sbyar bas dbu rgyan bdun khri
NK071(du)008:60: dgu stong drug brgya lnga bcu rnam grangs byung tshogs
NK071(du)008:61: su dgu khri lnga stong bdun brgyar mnan pas rgyud
NK071(du)008:62: snying po'i dbang du brtsis pa'i nyi khri chig stong
